title: Ticket #1658: unit test FTEST_string_to_hostname() fails.
description:
I found that unit test FTEST_string_to_hostname/test_normal_case() was failing because it couldn't look up north.cs.wisc.edu, which doesn't have a reverse lookup anymore. The test was assuming it would work.

I fixed up the test to handle it better when it can't find something which assumes must be there and made it look up "cs.wisc.edu" instead of "north.cs.wisc.edu". Hopefully, that'll last a bit longer. :)
remarks:
2010-Sep-15 15:58:28 by psilord:
Fixed in V7_4-branch, merged to master. Updated the use of the old unit test API used in the V7_4-branch to be the new API used in the master concerning this fix.
